attributes.action: Make child maintenance mandatory and class as a legitimate debt.
attributes.additional_details: These are human beings, for a credit card you will be chased and threatened with court action if you do not pay, why isn’t this the same for a parent and a child?
attributes.background: Make this a debt and chase those who miss payments just like company’s do with credit cards, loans etc…

rejection.details:
The Child Maintenance Service already takes action if child maintenance goes unpaid.

You can find out more about child maintenance enforcement here: https://www.gov.uk/manage-child-maintenance-case/nonpayment-what-happens
